### RNA-Seq coverage support for UTR boundaries

#### All detected sites

```{r, results='asis'}
# see also: scripts/tcruzi_ystrain/S01_*   
df <- num_reads %>% 
    mutate(pct_reads_sl=(num_reads_sl/num_reads_parasite) * 100,
           pct_reads_polya=(num_reads_polya/num_reads_parasite) * 100) %>%
    group_by(stage) %>%
    summarize("Human (millions)"=sum(num_reads_host, na.rm=TRUE) / 1E6,
              "T. cruzi (millions)"=sum(num_reads_parasite) / 1E6,
              "SL-containing reads"=mean(pct_reads_sl),
              "Poly(A)-containing reads"=mean(pct_reads_polya)) %>%
    rename("Parasite Stage"=stage)

xkable(df, caption='**Table 1**: Summary of mapping statistics.')
```
